reviewText:
This is an excellent video of some of the episodes of the l990's hit show, "Clarissa Explains It All".  Clarissa is your typical but cool girl-next-door character.  She's not your cookie cutter type like many of the girls in television shows  are today. Her relationship with her very smart and proper brother Ferguson is precious.

I recommend this to adults for nostalgia and children from about eight to thirteen; the "tween" set.

With any luck Nickelodeon will release every season of Clarissa on DVD.  I believe there is a market for it.
